<Text: Rita Sangalli:  In the same year, she joined the Paris Opera Ballet, where she performed in numerous premieres, including in the role of "Sylvia" (14 June 1876), "Yedda" (1879), and "Namouna" (6 March 1882).>
Triplets:<Rita Sangalli
4:
--------------------
Text: Rita Sangalli:  She retired from the company in 1884.
